dcterms:description: An internal dataset containing approximately 20 hours of speech data segmented into 13,079 utterances, used for training the Deep Voice TTS system.
dcterms:title: Internal English Speech Database

dcterms:creator: K. Prahallad
A. Vadapalli
N. Elluru
dcterms:description: A dataset used in the Blizzard Challenge 2013, specifically for the Indian Language Task, containing speech data for TTS.
dcterms:title: Blizzard 2013 Dataset

dcterms:creator: R. Weide
dcterms:description: A pronunciation dictionary that provides phoneme representations for words, used for grapheme-to-phoneme conversion in TTS.
dcterms:title: CMUDict
